content: linen stitch cowl by carly stipe instructions materials cast on 277 stitches with smaller needle loosely yarn 1 skein malabrigo arroyo working flat knit 4 row 100% superwash merino wool begin working linen stitch in the round no 335yds = 100 gr color shown 862 piedras beginning of round marker needed needle us 6 & 10 - 24 or 32 circular notion tapestry needle linen stitch knit on larger needle repeat k1 sl1wyif until cowl measures 4 25 size inches place marker approx 5 x60 after blocking work last row with smaller needle purl 1 round gauge knit 1 round and purl 1 round bind off loosely 18 stitches/4 in garter seam beginning first 4 row together weave in abbreviations ends and seam up the 4 knit row k=knit note when working the linen stitch in the sl1wyif=slip next stitch as if to purl with round you will be working the stitch the yarn in front opposite of what you see on your needle if you see a knit you will sl1wyif if you see a sl1wyif you will knit ©2015 darn knit anyway all rights reserved you are allowed to make a copy of this pattern for personal use only in whole or part editing and using the pattern as the basis for another pattern or as a template publishing transmitting darnknitanyway com emailing this pattern to others or posting online in whole or part is strictly prohibited 651 342 1386
